Package socialmedia

Class SocialMedia

java.lang.Object
socialmedia.SocialMedia
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, MiniSocialMediaPlatform, SocialMediaPlatform
public class SocialMedia extends Object implements SocialMediaPlatform
The social media class provides an interface to create, modify, read and delete posts or accounts
See Also:

    • createAccount

      public int createAccount(String handle) throws IllegalHandleException, InvalidHandleException
      This methods is used to create an account with a given handle
      Specified by:
      createAccount in interface MiniSocialMediaPlatform
      Parameters:
      handle - The handle of the account to be created
      Returns:
      The id of the new account
      Throws:
      IllegalHandleException - if the handle already exists in the platform.
      InvalidHandleException - if the handle is empty or has more than 30 characters or contains whitespaces

    • changeAccountHandle

      public void changeAccountHandle(String oldHandle, String newHandle) throws HandleNotRecognisedException, IllegalHandleException, InvalidHandleException
      This method is used to change the handle of an account
      Specified by:
      changeAccountHandle in interface MiniSocialMediaPlatform
      Parameters:
      oldHandle - The old hanlde of the account to be edited
      newHandle - The new handle of the account to be edited
      Throws:
      HandleNotRecognisedException - if the old handle doesn't match to any account in the system
      IllegalHandleException - if the new handle already is used for another account in the system
      InvalidHandleException - if the new handle is empty or has more than 30 characters or contains whitespaces

      message - The message of the post being created
      Returns:
      the id of the post created
      Throws:
      HandleNotRecognisedException - if the handle doesn't match to an account in the system
      InvalidPostException - if the post is empty or more than 100 character

    • endorsePost

      public int endorsePost(String handle, int id) throws HandleNotRecognisedException, PostIDNotRecognisedException, NotActionablePostException
      This method created a endorsement of a post with the given id
      Specified by:
      endorsePost in interface MiniSocialMediaPlatform
      Parameters:
      handle - The handle of the account posting the endorsement
      id - The id of the post being endorsed
      Returns:
      the id of the new endorsement
      Throws:
      HandleNotRecognisedException - if the handle doesn't match to an account in the system
      PostIDNotRecognisedException - if the id doesn't match to an post in the system
      NotActionablePostException - if the id refers to an endorsement post

    • commentPost

      public int commentPost(String handle, int id, String message) throws HandleNotRecognisedException, PostIDNotRecognisedException, NotActionablePostException, InvalidPostException
      This method is used to create a comment post
      Specified by:
      commentPost in interface MiniSocialMediaPlatform
      Parameters:
      handle - The hanlde of the account posting the comment
      id - The id of the post being commented on
      message - The message of the comment
      Returns:
      the sequential ID of the created post.
      Throws:
      HandleNotRecognisedException - if the handle doesn't match to an account in the system
      PostIDNotRecognisedException - if the id doesn't match to a post in the system
      NotActionablePostException - if the id refers to an endorsement
      InvalidPostException - if the comment message is empty or longer than 100 characters

    • showIndividualPost

      public String showIndividualPost(int id) throws PostIDNotRecognisedException
      Description copied from interface: MiniSocialMediaPlatform
      The method generates a formated string containing the details of a single post. The format is as follows: 
       ID: [post ID]
 Account: [account handle]
 No. endorsements: [number of endorsements received by the post] | No. comments: [number of comments received by the post]
 [post message]
      Specified by:
      showIndividualPost in interface MiniSocialMediaPlatform
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the post that the information is about
      Returns:
      a string of information about the account
      Throws:
      PostIDNotRecognisedException - if the id doesn't match to a post in the system

    • showPostChildrenDetails

      public StringBuilder showPostChildrenDetails(int id) throws PostIDNotRecognisedException, NotActionablePostException
      Description copied from interface: MiniSocialMediaPlatform
      The method builds a StringBuilder showing the details of the current post and all its children posts. The format is as follows (you can use tabs or spaces to represent indentation): 
       showIndividualPost(id)
 |
 [for reply: replies to the post sorted by ID]
 |  > showIndividualPost(reply)
      See an example: 
       ID: 1
 Account: user1
 No. endorsements: 2 | No. comments: 3
 I like examples.
 |
 | > ID: 3
     Account: user2
     No. endorsements: 0 | No. comments: 1
     No more than me...
     |
     | > ID: 5
         Account: user1
         No. endorsements: 0 | No. comments: 1
         I can prove!
         |                                         
         | > ID: 6                                 
             Account: user2                        
             No. endorsements: 0 | No. comments: 0 
             prove it                    
 | > ID: 4
     Account: user3
     No. endorsements: 4 | No. comments: 0
     Can't you do better than this?
 
 | > ID: 7
     Account: user5
     No. endorsements: 0 | No. comments: 1
     where is the example?
     |
     | > ID: 10
         Account: user1
         No. endorsements: 0 | No. comments: 0
         This is the example!
      Continuing with the example, if the method is called for post ID=5 (showIndividualPost(5)), the return would be: 
       ID: 5
 Account: user1
 No. endorsements: 0 | No. comments: 1
 I can prove!
 |                                         
 | > ID: 6                                 
     Account: user2                        
     No. endorsements: 0 | No. comments: 0 
     prove it
      Specified by:
      showPostChildrenDetails in interface MiniSocialMediaPlatform
      Parameters:
      id - of the post to be shown.
      Returns:
      a formatted StringBuilder containing the details of the post and its children.
      Throws:
      PostIDNotRecognisedException - if the ID does not match to any post in the system.
      NotActionablePostException - if the ID refers to an endorsement post. Endorsement posts do not have children since they are not endorsable nor commented.

    • savePlatform

      public void savePlatform(String filename) throws IOException
      Description copied from interface: MiniSocialMediaPlatform
      Method saves this SocialMediaPlatform's contents into a serialised file, with the filename given in the argument.
      Specified by:
      savePlatform in interface MiniSocialMediaPlatform
      Parameters:

      Throws:

    • loadPlatform

      public void loadPlatform(String filename) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Description copied from interface: MiniSocialMediaPlatform
      Method should load and replace this SocialMediaPlatform's contents with the serialised contents stored in the file given in the argument.

      The state of this SocialMediaPlatform's must be be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Specified by:
      loadPlatform in interface MiniSocialMediaPlatform
      Parameters:
      filename - location of the file to be loaded
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is a problem experienced when trying to load the store contents from the file
      ClassNotFoundException - if required class files cannot be found when loading
